page.title: 09Tourism
page.content: {Welsh Mountain Zoo. The Welsh Mountain Zoo,which was founded by Robert Jackson and opened in May 1963,is the only mountain zoo in Great Britain.It covers 37 acres but at present only about 15 to 20 acres are under development,most of the remaining acres being woodland.The zoo receives on average about 200,000 visitors a year. The zoo houses 629{animals}at present which includes 109 different species.The most popular are the chimps and the sea lions but there are also many{species which face {extinction.}These include Przewalski's horse,American Bald Eagle,Kulan(wild asp)and an American crocodile.Other animals at the zoo considered vulnurable are the Indian Python, Geoffroys Spider Monkey,Herman's tortoise as well as many others.
